trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat thinks it time to gather her allies for the road ahead.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_TODO_00<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_TODO_01<tab>Travel to Kozama'uka.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_TODO_04<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_TODO_05<tab>Wait at the designated location again.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_TODO_06<tab>Wait at the designated location once more.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Rediroq.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>I still haven't had one bite of Namikka's food thanks to Papa's nonsense, so I'm going back to finish my plate before I head out.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_002<tab>I've otherwise asked everyone to meet at the For'ard Cabins. Come and join us after you've had a moment to recover, eh?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_003<tab>Dammit, Papa...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_Q1_000_000<tab>Await your companions and continue with the rite of succession?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_FONJEANTAINE_000_006<tab>Sorry to keep everyone waiting.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_007<tab>Is that it? You're all set to go?

TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_FONJEANTAINE_000_008<tab>I left Eorzea prepared to travel in search of work, so I had few belongings to begin with. Bidding farewell to my fellow artisans took rather a lot of time, however.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_009<tab>Again, I appreciate you making this commitment, Fonjeantaine.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>Shall we depart for Earthenshire, then?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_011<tab>(-???-)A word before you go.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_012<tab>Wuk Evu, what are you doing here?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_013<tab>Ahhh! I spend my days correcting manners, and here I am perpetrating the grave offense of delaying the Third Promise's departure!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_014<tab>Please, take up your axe and rend my flesh unto taco meat!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab>Must your demands be so gruesome!? Besides, I told you that kind of thing doesn't bother me!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_016<tab>All right, then. I won't let it bother me either.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALISAIE_000_017<tab>What was that all about...?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_018<tab>I'd come to the city to purchase supplies when I spotted your entourage getting ready to leave. You seek the city of gold, if I'm not mistaken?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_019<tab>That's right─it's the final step of the rite of succession. If you know anything about the subject, I'd love to hear it.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_020<tab>Then allow me to be of service. As you know, legends of the golden city have been passed down in Tural for a thousand years.

TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_021<tab>Yet when it comes to describing the place itself, the stories do not always agree. Some portray it as one might expect: a glittering metropolis of golden towers. Others suggest it is more unassuming and owes the name to a fabulous treasure hidden at its heart.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_022<tab>Every telling, however, has a common thread: those who go in search of the golden city do not return.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_023<tab>The lesson to be learned from this, Third Promise, is that to seek the legend is to court death. I must implore you to proceed with the utmost care.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKEVU_000_024<tab>That is all I wished to say. I shall pray for your safe journey.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>Thank you, Wuk Evu.

TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_000_026<tab>What are we to make of these cautionary tales? If every expedition has ended in tragedy, how then did the Dawnservant find the city and return without incident?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_027<tab>It seems the legend originated with the Yok Huy. Speaking with them remains our strongest lead, I feel.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_028<tab>A lead we shall follow in time. But first, let us see Fonjeantaine safely into the Moblins' care.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>We're back, and we've brought with us a willing potsworn. This is Fonjeantaine, a talented goldsmith who once worked at Eshtaime's Aesthetics in Ul'dah.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_031<tab>Wonderful! Impressive! You are first to return, Third Promise!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_032<tab>And with an artisan from across the salt, no less! We welcome you and your unique skills to Earthenshire. Helphand will show you to the Workpot.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_FONJEANTAINE_100_032<tab>This is it, then. I look forward to hearing you proclaimed Dawnservant!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_033<tab>Thank you, Fonjeantaine. I'll be sure not to disappoint you.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_034<tab>You have reachmet the requirements of the Feat of Pots. Rediroq presents your keystone with joysmiles and wellwishing!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>That makes three...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_036<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... More potsworn candidates!? Come, come, tell Rediroq your tales!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_037<tab>Another feat accomplished, another keystone acquired.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_SAREELJA_000_038<tab>Ohohoho, you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> doing well. I expected nothing less of Zoraal Ja's esteemed siblings.

TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_SAREELJA_000_039<tab>Your cleverness in particular is most admirable, Second Promise. We must have you apply that Sharlayan knowledge you so cherish, and arm Tural with weapons of magitek design.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_SAREELJA_000_040<tab>...In your role as the new Dawnservant's chief advisor, of course.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_041<tab>The tools of war hold no interest for me. I wish only to improve our nation through practical innovations.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_042<tab>Foreign powers will think twice about testing our strength once Tuliyollal is known for its advanced technology.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_043<tab>Just as the Garlean Empire was deterred from invading Sharlayan.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_SAREELJA_000_044<tab>That may well be true... But how long will it take Tuliyollal to progress to this advanced state? How many years?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_045<tab>With a collective commitment to education and hard work, it should not take so very─
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ZORAALJA_000_046<tab>Your way is too slow.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ZORAALJA_000_047<tab>Easier to expand our territory...and swallow Sharlayan whole.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_THANCRED_000_048<tab>Conquer other nations through force of arms, and you're looking at a future of uprisings and bloodshed. Yours wouldn't be the first failed empire.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ZORAALJA_000_049<tab>Then we keep fighting, until the mounting costs convince them to lay down their weapons. Until all have grown tired of loss.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_050<tab>How would such an outcome bring anyone joy!? What you propose is a mockery of peace!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_051<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Rediroq is reminded of days long ago.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_052<tab>In the time before Tuliyollal, there were no potpacts for the potsworn. It was normal to grabsnatch artisans, and force them to work for Mobbies.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_053<tab>Until the day Gulool Ja Ja arrived. The families of the grabsnatched pleaded with him, and so he came to Earthenshire.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_054<tab>Mobbies are not a warmake people. We feared death had come for us, but Gulool Ja Ja just wanted to talk!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_GULOOLJAJA_000_055<tab>(-Vow of Reason Gulool Ja Ja-)Be at ease. We are here to trade words, not blows.

TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_GULOOLJAJA_000_056<tab>(-Vow of Reason Gulool Ja Ja-)The goldwork crafted in this village is superb. One can tell at a glance the quality of materials used; the mastery of technique employed.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_GULOOLJAJA_000_057<tab>(-Vow of Reason Gulool Ja Ja-)Yet it does not stir the heart. A goblet shaped by bound hands and broken spirit is devoid of luster.

TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_GULOOLJAJA_000_058<tab>(-Vow of Reason Gulool Ja Ja-)Compare that now to the works of a joyful artisan. She pours her very soul into her creations, and they shine like the newly risen sun. Have you not seen this to be true?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_059<tab>And so began the custom of goodliving. Happy potsworn make good works, and good works make Mobbies happy!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_060<tab>Gulool Ja Ja's words were wise! Joysmiles did indeed bring fine craft and much jinglyshine!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_061<tab>So the Head of Reason was behind the forging of potpacts...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_062<tab>Yes! Reason and cleverthink changed Mobbies' way of life!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ZORAALJA_000_063<tab>Hmph.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_SAREELJA_000_064<tab>The First Promise tires of your talk of olden days. He would rather look to the future, and the next feat.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_065<tab>We should be getting on as well.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALISAIE_000_066<tab>Bakool Ja Ja never did come back, did he?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_RAKOROK_000_067<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Do you have a moment, Third Promise?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_RAKOROK_000_068<tab>Rakorok would repay you for handhelping with Kaahe. He brings a tale of the golden city!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_069<tab>Really? I'd love to hear it!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_RAKOROK_000_070<tab>The towers, the streets, all fashioned from gold. Everywhere you look, every splendor you can imagine!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_RAKOROK_000_071<tab>The young, the old, and everyone in between, they live in golden happiness. A city of eternal bliss, forever perched above the clouds!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_072<tab>Everything fashioned from gold, eh? And just imagine everyone living in golden happiness─now that's a city I'd like to visit!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_073<tab>Excuse me, Rakorok, where did you hear that particular tale?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_RAKOROK_000_074<tab>From our longtime Yok Huy friends! They live up in the mountains, in Urqopacha.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_075<tab>The giants again...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_076<tab>Seems everything is pointing us their way!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_077<tab>This feat and everything leading up to it has taught me much about the Moblin way of life. I'll be sad to leave Earthenshire and your joysmiles behind!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_000_080<tab>These tales raise many questions... Let us hope the giants have answers.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_081<tab>The stories describe a place of boundless happiness, but are also rife with dire warnings of seekers who did not return. What are we to make of this...?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_082<tab>It unsettles me that Zoraal Ja is even a claimant in the first place. Surely his father cannot condone his violent ambitions...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALISAIE_000_083<tab>The Head of Reason in Rediroq's story sounds so different from the Head of Resolve. They share the same body, yet their personalities are wholly distinct.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_084<tab>Worry not for potsworn Fonjeantaine! He is in good helphands!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_085<tab>Right, we should go and see the giants next!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_000_086<tab>Agreed. Golden mysteries notwithstanding, their village is featured prominently in the saga and is not to be ignored.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_000_087<tab>The Urqopacha highlands should be easy enough to reach from here.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_000_088<tab>If we leave Earthenshire from the west, there's a road which leads up into the mountains. Let's find that first.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_100_089<tab>This road will take us through the mountains to the Urqopacha highlands. An exhausting route, perhaps, but a straightforward one.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_200_089<tab>We're to meet with the Yok Huy at last...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_300_089<tab>The highlands are where the Lay of Proof took place─that being Gulool Ja Ja's encounter with the Yok Huy.

TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_500_089<tab>But 'tis also the stage for the Lay of Ice, where heroes fought the monstrous Valigarmanda. I am most curious to know what the rite will demand of us there...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALISAIE_600_089<tab>One day we're sailing up rivers, and the next we're hiking up mountains.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>Looks like the trail is going to get steep from here on in. I hope everyone is ready for some climbing!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WAWKESA_000_091<tab>(-Bright-haired Tonawawtan Man-)Third Promise!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WAWKESA_000_092<tab>(-Bright-haired Tonawawtan Man-)I'm glad I caught you... Rediroq asked me to bring you back to the village.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WAWKESA_000_093<tab>(-Bright-haired Tonawawtan Man-)She says there's something she forgot to give you.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_094<tab>Huh...? Something other than the keystone?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WAWKESA_000_095<tab>(-Bright-haired Tonawawtan Man-)Yes, an item of great importance, or so I was told. It shouldn't take long, if you would please follow me.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_WUKLAMAT_000_096<tab>I wonder what this is all about? Well, no need for everyone to come─I'll be back in a little while!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_100_100<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Moblins are busy ensuring goodliving for new potsworn! Rediroq has no time for idle tongueflaps!
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_100<tab>He had rather interesting hair for a Hyur...or should I say Tonawawta? In any case, strange that I never noticed him while we were in Earthenshire.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_000_101<tab>Knowing Wuk Lamat, she was probably eating sweets behind our backs and forgot to pay the shopkeeper or something equally careless.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_102<tab>I'm eager to continue to the highlands and meet a Yok Huy face-to-face. We've heard much about them, but I'm not entirely sure what to expect.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALISAIE_000_103<tab>That man seemed familiar somehow... But I just can't place him.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_104<tab>This is taking quite a while... Just keep waiting for now, I suppose.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>Perhaps there were complications? Well, let us wait a little longer.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALISAIE_000_120<tab>This is getting a little ridiculous. Did she get lost on the way back to find us?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_121<tab>But how? There's only the one road.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_000_122<tab>I wouldn't underestimate Wuk Lamat's sense of direction...or lack thereof.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_123<tab>Fortunately, she has a linkpearl. Let's see what's keeping her, shall we?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_124<tab>She's not responding... Perhaps we should all return to Earthenshire.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_125<tab>'Twas Rediroq who had business with her, yes?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_130<tab>She doesn't seem to be here...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ERENVILLE_000_131<tab>I'd thought Wuk Lamat was just being her usual impulsive self, but now I'm not so certain...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_132<tab>I pray naught untoward has befallen the Third Promise.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALISAIE_000_133<tab>Something's not right. I can feel it...
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_134<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Back again so soon?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_135<tab>We've come looking for Wuk Lamat. Did you not send someone to fetch her?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_REDIROQ_000_136<tab>Rediroq did not! Neither has she seen the Third Promise since you were last here.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KRILE_000_137<tab>Then who was that man who came for her...?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_THANCRED_000_138<tab>Oh? I thought you'd left already.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_139<tab>Where is Lamaty'i? Is she not with you?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_140<tab>You don't <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> where she is? How could you let this happen!?
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_URIANGER_000_141<tab>That thou shouldst worry for thy sister is understandable. Yet rather than assign blame, thine energies are better spent on locating her.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_142<tab>I will help you search. This is not how I'd wish a fellow claimant to lose the contest─my sister least of all.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_THANCRED_000_143<tab>In that case, dividing our forces will allow us to cover more ground.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_144<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I should work together at least, the better to facilitate communication between our groups.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_ALPHINAUD_000_145<tab>Then the rest of us will split up. Report in should you find anything.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_THANCRED_000_146<tab>We'll be on our way as well.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_147<tab>Right. Keep in touch.
TEXT_KINGMB105_04884_KOANA_000_148<tab>Come─we should begin our search.
